text: Ahmed Aboul Gheit (, also: Abu al-Ghayt, Abu El Gheyt, etc.) (born 12 June 1942) is an Egyptian diplomat. He is the 8th and current Secretary-General of the Arab League since July 2016. == Career == Aboul-Gheit was the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Egypt from 11 July 2004 to 6 March 2011. He was Egypt's Permanent Representative to the United Nations."Envoy to UN Named Foreign Minister in New Egyptian Govt", Reuters (Arab News), 11 July 2004. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Secretaries General of the Arab League Category:Ambassadors of Egypt Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations Category:Politicians from Cairo Category:Writers from Cairo Category:Ain Shams University alumni
title: Ahmed Aboul Gheit
